content:
add to this description the fact that Akeem has two degrees, first a Bachelor of Arts with Major in Psychology and Minor in Philosophy, and second a Bachelor of Laws, coupled with his experience playing and competing in high level basketball teams, and how these experiences support his entrepreneurial journey and aid in his unique traits in running Canurta: Akeem Gardner, Canurta's founder, sees hemp as a powerful agent for transformative change. Five years ago, he embarked on a journey to cultivate hemp with the ambition of uncovering innovative approaches to revolutionize industries that significantly affect our well-being.

Akeem is determined to introduce genuine, nature-based solutions to inflammation, aiming to tackle the world's most pressing health challenge – effectively and safely preventing and managing chronic diseases. His entrepreneurial spirit and unwavering commitment to bettering global health drives him forward on his heroic quest for change.
